model
Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      model.GameManager

public class GameManager
extends java.util.Observable

GameManager: Knows a chess game and up to two computer players, makes moves in the game and informs observers of whenever a move has been made.

Set the players to play the game

Parameters:

Execute a particular move and notify all observers

move

public void move()
If there is a computer player set for the color whose turn it is, ask it to make a move; if not, do nothing.
